channel.title: Npc drops problem project corrupted
channel.description:
i need help with project corrupted base i dont wnana leech it !!!!!! Big Grin i changed some drops but when i try to run server this happens
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2168) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:111) Project Corrupted
pls tell me where did i make mistake and how do i correct it !!!! Confused Confused

item.title: Npc drops problem project corrupted
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

Too bad, I’m not going to do that for you… If you can’t do this, than you shouldn’t try to make a server.
Also mistakes are for learning. So you’ll get better in time

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drops problem project corrupted
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

You got a space in Npcdrops.cfg, don’t use spaces only tabs
